EmailTemplate.name: Tech Field Day Invite.TFD5 Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Virtualization Field Day Live Hosted By VMTurbo!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <http://techfieldday.com/event/vfd5/> Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Tune in toady at 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM EST as VMTurbo hosts Virtualization Field Day 5, live from our brand new offices in downtown Boston. If you aren't familiar with the Tech Field Day Series, these events bring together vendors and members from the community to have technical discussions about various vendors' products and offerings and are streamed live on their website <http://techfieldday.com/event/vfd5/>. The full listing of the vendors presenting, including the schedule can be found here <http://techfieldday.com/event/vfd5/>. We hope to see you on the live stream and make sure to engage with the #VFD5 hashtag on Twitter for more exciting news! <http://techfieldday.com/event/vfd5/> - The VMTurbo Team
